methods.walk:
Glue method to deliver this Aggregation to a AggSpec.Visitor.

Note: Java generics information - <V extends io.deephaven.api.agg.Aggregation.Visitor>

:param visitor: (V) - The visitor
:return: (V) The visitor

text:
A ColumnAggregation is an Aggregation that is composed of a spec and a single input/output
 column pair. The spec defines the aggregation operation to apply to the input column in order to
 produce the paired output column.
